Articles.Content:
I ALMOST have it.

Okey, so after a lot of tweaks, I almost have KSP RO/RSS/Principia working in 1.11.2.

In fact, it does work, but there are sometimes CTD during takeoff. And I recently noticed something new, something made the UI behave in a strange way. For instance, I would open the Mission panel and get a weird double UI.

Now I don't have a log of the CTD. Since it didn't happen last session. But I do have the log for this UI bug.
Here's a log for the CTDs I just had.

Yet another Log, in hopes someone will someday help me find what mod causes it.

 

https://1drv.ms/u/s!Ar4K1JJSZgwdoxBMUTzjz_o-Ol-i?e=ZCe81T
